Text:
Why did you chose to upload a movie that has already been posted on TPB more than 400 times as your first torrent?

In the future, I suggest you ought to search the site to see if it is needed before deciding to upload something.

Look here:  https://thepiratebay.org/search/Salt*/0/7/200

You also ought to read this:  http://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=Torrent%20Whore

@ velvet. 

sorry, i'm new so... but thaks for telling me.
